channel.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FcCLd.png[/img]
[url=http://www.Hexbot.hourb.com]www.Hexbot.hourb.com[/url]
[u][SIZE=4][COLOR=Lime]What is HexBot?[/COLOR][/SIZE][/u]
[SIZE=2][COLOR=DarkOrange]HexBot is a unique, low cpu bot which currently supports battle-scape only. We have fast updates and an api available for every one to make scripts with. This bot is unique unlike the others, who does not have fully working interfaces and models for Players,Npcs and Objects and a stable and an expanding API.[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[SIZE=3][COLOR=Lime]Pictures:[/COLOR][/SIZE] [IMG]http://gyazo.com/10e73e331591d381e4fda486a0298992.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/057999d52e12d348969d9388cc97cb5e.png[/img]
[IMG]http://gyazo.com/d35a949b529a22f1890ba45a18e74f60[/img]
[u][SIZE=4]Our Goal[/size][/u]
[SIZE=2]Our goal is to support as many top private servers as possible. Such as Near-reality, Arrav and 2006scape. To keep being the #1 rsps bot with high quality scripts to make our members satisfied.[/size]

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Ambokile, post:25, topic:465165”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=569881.msg4212043#msg4212043 date=1359702965]

Funny how all 3 servers mentioned in said goal are now down ?

loveing Gravedig.
[/quote]
Gravedig? There was less than a month between his post and the last post.[/quote]
OP was back in October.

Read full topic

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

yh, i would like if this bot also could be botting for you on 562 - 732 servers like zenith or anything like that, but since its like 317 it’s a bit sad because i never ever are going to play 317 again sometimes this bot could be worthless because its not many rsps that need so much time to get a lvl to 99, will take you 10 min or less for that normaly but like zenith’s source that i use it would take up to 15 - 1 hour to make just 99 prayer, so would be cool to bot it insted X)

Read full topic

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @darkzcap3 darkzcap3
item.description:
@darkzcap3 wrote:

seriously people? can you guys just be happy that some people actually takes the time to make these things?
if you think this is stupid why do you even bother commenting go click your mouses in hours to get some skills to 99 on a rsps instead of hating on this while other people can actually just put this on and do something else while this no-life for them instead

Awesome, keep up the good work man++<3

Read full topic

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:

moelex64:

you guys are so stupid why would this be stupid you know some people wether its a server or not are lazy or like to bot just to look at the paint after 3 hours and some people just have lives. no need to hate just click back go hate on something else.

->has life
->bots
Goes together great!

Read full topic

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @All_Time_Low All Time Low
item.description:
@All_Time_Low wrote:

[quote=“alohha, post:1, topic:465165”]

www.Hexbot.hourb.com

[SIZE=4][COLOR=Lime]What is HexBot?[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=2][COLOR=DarkOrange]HexBot is a unique, low cpu bot which currently supports battle-scape only. We have fast updates and an api available for every one to make scripts with. This bot is unique unlike the others, who does not have fully working interfaces and models for Players,Npcs and Objects and a stable and an expanding API.[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[SIZE=3][COLOR=Lime]Pictures:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

10e73e331591d381e4fda486a0298992.png778×520

057999d52e12d348969d9388cc97cb5e.png777×484

[SIZE=4]Our Goal[/size]

[SIZE=2]Our goal is to support as many top private servers as possible. Such as Near-reality, Arrav and 2006scape. To keep being the #1 rsps bot with high quality scripts to make our members satisfied.[/size][/quote]

Hey mate, don’t listen to what anyone says.
This is a good idea!
Sometime’s we can use this bot when were afk doing chores or even out doing in event in real life and this bot will make us some money while were gone which will be beneficial!
Maybe some people don’t what this mainly cause they own a server and it will hurt it, i myself own a server and i wouldn’t mind this bot, it will keep players online won’t it? Yes!

Keep up the work man!

Btw you should make a bot for source: DeathlyPvpz v2.
They have their source released if that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @oldy oldy
item.description:
@oldy wrote:

Hell i dont even play rs2 private servers but if i did, i would bot.

I only play to PK (most enjoyable aspect of RS) and seeing as i work/do university botting is an easy way to get items to do just that.

Read full topic

item.title: HexBot - The #1 RSPS bot
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“xI c E, post:6, topic:465165”]You wasted your time making a bot for a RSPS when you could of been making one for the real game.[/quote]Those are two completely different projects to take on. Keeping up with Jagex’s client protocol and what not is more difficult then making one bot for multiple clients.
